description: Tooyama Kinji oversleeps and misses the bus to Tokyo Butei High School, and is forced to take his bicycle. He suddenly finds himself apparently a target of the infamous "Butei Killer", with a bomb attached to his bicycle and being chased by a robot in the form of an Uzi attached to a Segway, but is saved by a girl called Kanzaki Holmes Aria who falls from the sky in a parachute. When Kinji finally arrives at school he finds that Aria has transferred into his class, and after school she appears at his house, declaring him to be her slave.
